summary: Simple retexture for the Female Werewolf by Moutarde421, adding the nether bits.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple texture mod to round off the great work done by Moutarde421. It uses the base texture from that mod and adds some nether bits to the female, namely, a vagina and anus. I also used Farron122\'s \"Werewolves-under the tail\" mod for the anus texture and placement. I highly recommend his mod in conjunction with Derrax Male Werewolves. All of these mods combined will hopefully lend a bit of visual realism to being a werewolf in Skyrim. Or at the very least, you can have a good laugh.

Moutarde421\'s Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10989/?
Derrax Male Werewolves: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4445/?
Werewolves-under the tail by Farron122: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8126/?

To install: download with NMM (fastest way) and load AFTER loading Moutarde421\'s Female Werewolf mod

Manual installation instructions are included in the download but just in case you misplace that here they are:
	1. Download the mod Female Werewolf by Moutarde421
	2. Install the Female Werewolf mod (via NMM preferrably)
	3. Navigate to your Skyrim installation folder (eg. C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim)
	4. Open Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\werewolf
	5. Rename \"FemaleWerewolfbody.dds\" to \"FemaleWerewolfbody_original.dds\" so that you can switch back if you like
	6. Extract the file \"FemaleWerewolfbody.dds\" from the Primal Matriarch archive to Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\werewolf
	7. Load Skyrim and enjoy
author: Jabberwocky07
